fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
•Factional Chat
•No factional kill unless the offensive member is dead
• Max of 4 members. One Offensive member is guaranteed to spawn and the rest are support
• If more Stand Users were to be created during the course of the game, they will become an offensive role and will receive the goal "see all other stand users dead by the end of the game" and will not join the factional chat or learn the names of the other stand users
•Yes, this is a jojo reference

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that your group is victorious over all others

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Ensure that your group is victorious over all others
